version_description: Restored the ability to play against game center friends in most recent versions of iOS.
This update adds a way to invite friends via the Message app and iCloud, making it possible again with the latest iOS version.

Fixed a crasher with GameCenter. Issues addressed in 1.90:
 • when using voice over the interface could get stuck after choosing a card
 • layout on iPhone Max sized devices was broken in many places
Fixed an issue which did not allow players with more recently generated Game Center IDs to play cards.
